effect.sun_moon: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.

short_effect.sun_moon: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
